title: Bug 35156: Ctrl+F1 works only on some fields in the help search
OB: When launching Eclipse with DBCS locale and selecting 'Search Help' from the menu bar, pressing Ctrl+F1 on the first text field does not produce any result. No help pop-up screen is displayed.
EB: Pressing Ctrl+F1 on the first text field should trigger a help pop-up screen displaying information about the HelpSearch.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch Eclipse with DBCS locale. 2. Select 'Search Help' from the menu bar. 3. When the window pops up, click on the first text field. 4. Press Ctrl+F1. Expected result: A help pop-up screen should come up displaying information about the HelpSearch. Note: This issue occurs on all DBCS languages. Also, cycling through all other fields using the tab key and pressing Ctrl+F1 functions properly by displaying the correct text.
